channel.title: William Alexakis Blog
channel.description: Personal blog and writings by William Alexakis on programming languages, systems programming, and software engineering.

item.title: Writing My Own Programming Language
item.description: How I built Phase, a statically-typed bytecode-interpreted language, from scratch to bridge the gap between high-level and low-level languages.
item.author: w.alexakis@icloud.com (William Alexakis)
